common.dialogHeaderTooltip: This window displays the status of your transaction.
common.lowUstAmountAfterTransaction: You'll have no gas money for future transactions if you execute this transaction
common.prioritizeXdefiWallet: Prioritize XDEFI in the wallet to connect
common.txTooltip: This window displays the status of your transaction.
common.youveArrivedOnMars: You've arrived on Mars, Terra blockchain's credit protocol.

council.activeProposalTooltip: All proposals on Mars go through several phases. In the event a successful vote, the update will be implemented, tested and released.
council.activeProposalCurrentVoteTooltip: To ensure sufficient participation, votes must reach quorum (currently 10% of all votable MARS tokens) to be eligible for adoption. Once quorum is reached, the majority of votes for or against will prevail. Proposals that do not reach quorum automatically fail.
council.activeProposalMyVoteTooltip: If you hold xMARS tokens, you are eligible to vote in all active proposals.
council.allProposalsTooltip: The following proposals have closed. Proposals that passed have been or are in the process of being implemented on Mars.
council.averageParticipationTooltip: The average participation rate of the last five proposals, from all users staking in the Martian Council
council.cooldownDetails: The amount of Mars will become availabe AFTER THE REMAINING TIME. Process can’t be stopped or modified.
council.cooldownEndsIn: Unstaking cooldown ends in {{remaining}}, once it runs out you'll be able to unstake your MARS
council.cooldownFinished: Cooldown time is over. {{mars}} MARS are available to unstake.
council.cooldownTooltip: When the cooldown period expires, you’ll be able to fully unstake your MARS.
council.cooldownEndedTooltip: Your cooldown has expired and you can now unstake your MARS.
council.creator: Creator
council.firstStakeDisclaimer: By staking MARS into the protocol you will be able to take part in the voting process and shape the future of this project. In return for your MARS you will receive xMARS, that represents your voting power. Please keep in mind that MARS and xMARS are not the same thing and also have a different value (exchange rate). You also earn yield on your staked MARS.
council.firstUnstakeDisclaimer: By unstaking your xMARS your will receive your MARS back. There is a {{time}} cooldown period from the moment you request your MARS back. You can unstake partially or the full amount. You can’t start a new cooldown as long another cooldown is running, so carefully define the amount to unstake.
council.governanceOverviewTooltip: To participate in the governance process on Mars, you must stake MARS tokens. When you stake MARS, you will receive xMARS. xMARS accrues interest in the form of rewards and protocol fees at the annual percentage yield (APY) shown below. You can unstake xMARS at any time but you will be subject to {{time}} cooldown period. After {{time}}, you will receive your initial MARS deposit in addition to any interest you earned before the start of the cooldown period. In other words, you will receive more MARS than you deposited. Remember that MARS stakers help backstop the protocol in the event of any shortfalls. Be sure you understand all of the risks and benefits of staking Mars by visiting our docs before staking MARS.
council.marsStakingWarning: Any MARS staked now will not contribute to your voting power on this proposal
council.newProposalTooltip: Every MARS proposal requires a deposit of 100,000 MARS. At minimum, you must enter a title, description and link for your proposal. Calls to Execute are optional.
council.notificationWarning: At the time this proposal was created, you did not hold any xMARS so you are ineligible for to vote on this proposal. <1>Learn more.</1>
council.stakingMarsTooltip: Choose the number of MARS tokens you’d like to stake for xMARS. Each xMARS is worth one vote in the Martian Council.
council.stakingMarsDisclaimerTooltip: All decisions on Mars are made by the Martian Council, composed of MARS stakers who put skin in the game to backstop certain kinds of protocol risk in exchange for a portion of the protocol borrowing fees. Unstaking MARS is subject to a 14-day cooldown period. That means you’ll need to intiate the unstaking process here and wait 14 days before you can officially unstake your MARS tokens.
council.stakingRatioTooltip: Of all the circulating Mars tokens, what percentage are staked in the Martian Council
council.title: Title
council.totalProposalsTooltip: The total number of proposals to date that have been submitted in the Martian Council
council.totalStakedTooltip: This is the total Mars staked for all users in the Martian Council
council.unstakeReminder: Reminder: Cooldown time is {{time}}. Only one cooldown  at a time. cooldown can not be stopped.
council.unstakingMarsTooltip: Choose the amount of MARS you would like to unstake.
council.unstakingMarsDisclaimerTooltip: When you unstake your xMARS, your xMARS are redeemed for MARS.
council.warningYouHaveErrorsInYourForm: Warning: You have errors in your form - please fix before you continue.
council.yourStakedMarsAreReadyToUnstake: Cooldown has ended. {{marsToUnstake}} MARS are ready to be unstaked.

error.errorMarsBalance: You do not have enough MARS in your wallet to submit a proposal.
error.errorRedbankNoLiquidity: The amount you’re trying to borrow exceeds the amount available for borrowing from the Red Bank. Please try a smaller amount.
error.errorLoanLimitExhausted: The credit line for this strategy is exhausted. You can only adjust your position in a way that does not borrow additional {{secondarySymbol}}.
error.failingRequest: One or more data requests were unsuccessful
error.failingRequestDescription: The application might display incorrect data on-screen or behave unexpectedly. Use a blockchain explorer to verify transactional data. This issue might resolve itself, or try reloading the application.
error.fieldsEstimateFeeError:
Something went wrong while we were simulating your transaction.
Please reload the page and try again.
If the problem persists, please try closing your position or contacting support.
error.marsContractsCouldNotBeFound: Mars contracts could not be found on the selected network
error.problemPersists: If the problem persists, please reach out to the Discord community <1>here</>
error.selectADifferentNetwork: Select a different network from your wallet provider.
error.serverOfflineBody: A server seems to be down at the moment. Please try again later.
error.youHaveAFailingNetworkRequest: You need a working internet connection to interact with the application. Please make sure you are connected.

fields.availableStrategiesTooltip: Click 'Farm' to initiate a new position on the Fields of Mars.
fields.buyAssetsToFarm: Buy assets first to be able to farm. <1>Learn how</1>
fields.clickOnFarm: Click on Farm below to start. <1>Learn how</1>
fields.fieldsBreakdownTooltip: To avoid liquidation, ensure your position stays above the listed liquidation threshold and your primary asset stays above the liquidation price.
fields.fieldsBreakdownCurrentPositionTooltip: Your current position and liquidation threshold.
fields.fieldsBreakdownUpdatedPositionTooltip: Your position and liquidation threshold after modifying your position.
fields.fieldsDisclaimer: This is experimental software. Please read the<1>disclaimers</1>
fields.fieldsTooltip: An overview of your activity on the Fields of Mars. “Unrealized PNL” stands for Unrealized Profit and Loss, meaning these are gains or losses that you have not yet realized or harvested.
fields.fieldsPrimaryAssetTooltip: Choose the amount of primary asset you would like to supply. To reduce your leverage, you can supply {{secondaryAsset}} along with your primary asset.
fields.fieldsSecondaryAssetTooltip: To reduce your leverage, you can supply {{secondaryAsset}} along with your primary asset.
fields.fieldsOfMarsOverviewTooltip: An overview of your activity on the Fields of Mars.
fields.introDescription: Proceed with caution fellow Farmer. Riches and ruins lie ahead.
fields.introButton: Read the Manual, no really, read it!
fields.myActiveStrategiesTooltip:
Net Value: The net value (deposit + borrowings) for each strategy.

PNL: Your total profit and loss on this strategy. PnL is the change in value of a position since the position was last updated. When a position is edited or created a snapshot of the position is recorded, and the PnL is calculated as currentValue - snapshotValue, where value is the total UST value of the position.

APY: An estimated annual percentage yield. The APY are calculated using token prices denominated in UST. Prices are fetched from Astroport pools. Also, the APY are 365 day projections based on each pool’s performance over the last 24h. See Mars Disclaimers & Disclosures for more details.

Leverage: Your leverage is calculated by adding the amount you've deposited and borrowed and dividing it by your deposit amount.

Liq. Price: You are in danger of liquidation if the token used by this strategy hits the price displayed.
fields.myActiveStrategiesManageTooltip:
Click “Manage” to adjust or close your active Fields of Mars strategies. Abbreviations are defined here:

PNL: Profit and loss. PnL is the change in value of a position since the position was last updated. When a position is edited or created a snapshot of the position is recorded, and the PnL is calculated as currentValue - snapshotValue, where value is the total UST value of the position.
APY: An estimated annual percentage yield. The APY are calculated using token prices denominated in UST. Prices are fetched from Astroport pools. Also, the APY are 365 day projections based on each pool’s performance over the last 24h. See Mars Disclaimers & Disclosures for more details.
Liq. Price: Liquidation price
LTV: Loan-to-value ratio

If your LTV hits 100%, you are in danger of being liquidated.
fields.positionHasAccruedAnEstimated: <0>Position has accrued an estimated {{pnlString}} of </0><1>${{pnl}}</1><2> After changing your position the PnL for this position will reset and start at 0 again.</2>
fields.primaryAssetNeedsToBeSupplied: Primary asset needs to be supplied. Only UST can be borrowed.
fields.safetyFundTooltip: The amount of UST held by the Martian Council Safety fund to cover any shortfall events
fields.volatilityNotification: Due to volatile conditions of the underlying assets, your position can only be closed or remain as is. It is not possible to change the position in any other way until volatility decreases.
fields.youDontHaveAnyActiveStrategy: You don't have any active strategies yet
fields.youDontHaveTheRequiredAssets: You don't have the required assets in your wallet yet

incentives.airdropClaimNotification: You have an unclaimed MARS airdrop, click <1>HERE</1> to claim it
incentives.marsRewardsCenterTooltip: If you’re eligible for Mars rewards including Red Bank rewards and Phase 1, Phase 2 or airdrop rewards, you can claim them here.

landing.asYouCrossOverToMars:
As you cross over to Mars, you’ll find your station. This is your dashboard where you can review your portfolio, deposit or borrow cryptos and find interesting opportunities to earn yield.

Once you’re settled in, you’re ready to explore everything Mars has to offer.
landing.forTheAdventurous:
For the adventurous, the fields of Mars whisper promises of riches. They give you a place to borrow crypto from the Red Bank and leverage your yield farming activities.

Never before has this been possible on one protocol.
landing.lendBorrow:
Lend, borrow and earn with an
autonomous credit protocol on
the Terra blockchain. Open to all.
Closed to none.
landing.onMarsThereAreNoLimits:
On Mars, there are no limits. Anyone, anywhere in the galaxy can lend or borrow crypto.

Built atop Terra, Mars will be the first credit protocol to utilize dynamic rates that canadapt to changing market conditions.

It will be the foundation for a new constellation of not just financial products but of governance and collaboration too.
landing.theRedBankIsTheLifeblood:
The Red Bank is the lifeblood of Mars. A fully automated lending protocol, it runs on computer code 24/7 without human (or Martian) intervention.

It has the potential to accept any form of digital value for deposits and loans, from cryptos to synthetic stocks and beyond.
landing.weBelieveInThePowerOfIndividuals:
We believe in the power of individuals over corporations; of innovation over the status quo; and of giving a voice to the ones with skin in the game.

Join Mars now and help create a truly free and decentralized future… one where we take the 1%’s financial tools and freedoms and deliver them to the 99%.

The future awaits.
landing.yourVoiceMattersHere:
Your voice matters here.

Stake the Mars token (MARS) and earn the right to ascend to the Citadel and take a seat on the Martian Council.

There, you’ll help the protocol shape the very future, not just of our planet, but of the entire Terra galaxy and beyond.

mystation.claimYourTerritoryByConnectingYourWallet: Claim your territory by connecting your wallet
mystation.marketsDepositedTooltip: An overview of your deposit activity on Mars. APYs are estimates. The Income/Day column shows your average income per day.
mystation.marketsBorrowedTooltip: An overview of your borrowing activity on Mars. The Borrow Rate is the current estimated annual interest rate for borrowing each asset from Mars. The Expense/Day column shows your average borrowing fees per day for each asset.
mystation.myLockdropTooltip: If you deposited UST in the Mars lockdrop, it will appear here.
mystation.myStationOverviewTooltip: See the total value of your holdings on Mars in UST. Each xMARS generates rewards (displayed as an APY) and is worth 1 unit of voting power on the Martian Council. xMARS can be redeemed for MARS tokens after a 7-day unstaking period.
mystation.readMoreAboutMarsOrLearnHowToUseMyStatio: <0>Read more about Mars</0> or <2>learn how to use my Station.</2>
mystation.thisCouldBeYourFutureStation: This could be your Future Station
mystation.withinTheRedBankYourUstCanBeUsed: Within the Red Bank your UST can be used as a collateral.

redbank.buyAssetsFirstToBeAbleToDeposit: Buy assets first to be able to deposit them. <1>Learn how</1>
redbank.buyAssetsFirstToBeAbleToBorrow: Buy assets first, then deposit to be able to borrow. <1>Learn how</1>
redbank.lendAndBorrowMoney: Lend and borrow tokens on the Terra blockchain
redbank.readMoreAboutMarsOrLearnHowToUseTheRedBa: <0>Read more about Mars</0> or <2>learn how to use the Red Bank.</2>
redbank.redbankActionBorrowTooltip: Enter the amount you would like to borrow. You can see how this transaction will impact any existing borrowing balance in the New Borrow Balance panel.
redbank.redbankActionDepositTooltip: Enter the amount you would like to deposit. You can see how this transaction will impact any existing deposit balance in the New Deposit Balance panel.
redbank.redbankActionWithdrawTooltip: Enter the amount you would like to withdraw. You can see how this transaction will impact any existing deposit balance in the New Deposit Balance panel.
redbank.redbankActionRepayTooltip: Enter the amount of debt you would like to repay. You can see how this transaction will impact your debt in the New Borrow Balance panel.
redbank.redBankMarketsDepositedTooltip: An overview of your deposit activity on Mars. APYs are estimates.
redbank.redBankMarketsDepositedNotConnectedToolt: When you deposit assets in the Red Bank, they’re deposited into smart contract liquidity pools and made available for borrowing by other users and smart contracts. Depositers earn a pro-rata portion of the yield that’s generated by the pool. Deposits can also be used as collateral to borrow from the Red Bank.
redbank.redbankMarketsBorrowedTooltip: An overview of your borrowing activity on Mars. The Borrow Rate is the current estimated annual interest rate for borrowing each asset from Mars. Rates change based on market conditions.
redbank.redbankMarketsBorrowedNotConnectedToolti: Deposits can be used as collateral to borrow from the Red Bank at the rates displayed. Rates change based on market conditions.
redbank.redbankPortfolioTooltip: You can borrow up to the red line in the Borrowing Capacity bar graph. If you fill the entire Borrowing Capacity bar, you’re in danger of liquidation.
redbank.redBankTooltip: Your max LTV is {{collateralLimit}} or {{collateralLimitValue}} UST based on your current collateral makeup. You are at {{currentPercentage}} of your liquidation threshold. If you reach 100%, you are at immediate risk of liquidation.
redbank.youAreGettingCloserToGettingLiquidated: You are getting closer to getting liquidated. Deposit more to reduce risk. <1>Learn more.</1>
redbank.youDontHaveAnyAssetsInYourWallet: You don't have any Assets in your wallet So Far
redbank.youDontHaveBorrowedOrDepositedAnyAsset: You don't have any borrowed assets so far.
